review: I absolutely love it..it is the coolest thing. I use it for everything
author: Danny bacosa

review: Met and exceeded my expectations! An excellent device to accompany my AppleTV.
author: Davidby

review: Would not load properly with my wf-fi connection.  Three seconds of streaming, then ten seconds of loading, then three of streaming, then ten of loading, forever.  Never did load an entire program.  Finally gave up and sent it back and went with another option (not Amazon).  I am sure it is a great product for people who has super fast internet, but it does not work with less robust connections.  I was so looking forward to using the app for my tablet, too.
author: California Dreamin'

review: Fire stick has been great. It is a great alternative and convenience to other methods of music, TV, Networks, etc.
author: A reader

review: I just wish I could get better connection further from modem.
author: Marianne L. Knight-schiavoni "Gift Giver"
